projects.title: Personnel Management
projects.description: The personnel management project was initiated under the supervision of the school's general director. Divided into four parts: personnel management, service management, absence and leave management, and finally, mission order management, this project aims to create a website that integrates each of these components. Its main objective is to improve the management of the four key aspects of human resource management and provide relevant statistics to guide the organization's strategic decisions.

projects.title: Real Estate Management
projects.description: This project involves creating a web application to assist in managing and storing sales or rental listings for a real estate agency. The main goal is to provide a structured, persistent, and centralized storage of data using databases, facilitating quick and optimized access to information. The application will include features like listing, editing, deleting, adding new listings, and searching based on type and price range.
projects.report: Link to Figma for design validation and GitHub for source code.

projects.title: Moroccan Crafts E-commerce
projects.description: A full-stack Laravel 10 E-commerce platform with Stripe payment, role-based admin panel (Spatie Permission), product & order management, wishlist, cart, and clean UI built with TailwindCSS and Alpine.js.

projects.title: Landing Page for Businesses
projects.description: A modern, high-converting landing page built with React, Vite, and TailwindCSS. Designed with a premium UI/UX focus and optimized for SEO, speed, and mobile performance. Includes animated components, live conversion dashboard using Chart.js, and multilingual support with i18next.
